abstract: The Rangers and the Cardinals meet in St. Louis at Busch Stadium, with Texas holding a 3-2 lead in the Series.
snippet: The Rangers and the Cardinals meet in St. Louis at Busch Stadium, with Texas holding a 3-2 lead in the Series.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - Major League Baseball postponed the game a day, and then (at least on the East Coast) it stretched into early Friday morning. The result was one of the wildest and most memorable World Series games ever played, a 10-9 extra-inning victory for the St. Louis Cardinals that will force the first Game 7 of a World Series since 2002.

headline.main: World Series: Cardinals Force a Game 7
